cause.description:
1. A judge should not mandate a witnesses speech under oath.
2. Victim's deserve as many rights as criminals do.
3. It is a first amendment right to free speech, especially under oath.
cause.mission: To end the court's power to rule the banning of the words 'rape', 'sexual assault nurse examiner' and 'sexual assault' from a rape trial. A rape victim's free speech should not be limited under oath.
cause.name: Support Victims Nationwide
